channel.title: Adding custom items
channel.description: How do I add custom items to my server?!? I have seen many tutorials on how to add them, but in my client, I don't have the class8.java file. EVERY tutorial the I have seen requires you to use the class8.java file. I don't have that file in my client. How do I add custom items to my server if I don't have the class8.java file? I am using the Project-Exile client and source.

item.title: Adding custom items
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“gamestop666, post:3, topic:443879”]Thanks. So basically I just use itemdef.java instead of using class8.java?[/quote]Yes and you need to add the models to your raw folder in your cache…

Read full topic

item.title: Adding custom items
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Well to sum up what mr extreme said in a easier way

Download the model, then add the model into your cache raw folder
Then there will be ints for it, put the ints in itemdef.java (client sided)
Once you do that your item is loaded but doesnt have any stats
Now you must add it in item.cfg(source sided) then add the stats however you like and Wala you got yourself a custom item

Read full topic

item.title: Adding custom items
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

So i think project exile is project insanity I’m not sure tho… Anyways you make customs client sided in itemdef.java and then you add it server sided in item.cfg

Read full topic
